2655ef96-0dcf-47b7-accd-ae3a6aae8cc4.description: The evening was focused on trends and challenges to transform the industry towards sustainable construction.The program included an insightful keynote on the human component in transformations; followed by a moderated panel with experts from the construction industry and open roundtable discussions on key trends of the building sector. Furthermore, expertise on change management and leveraging startup innovation to accelerate transformations has been discussed.
2655ef96-0dcf-47b7-accd-ae3a6aae8cc4.name: “GroundMAQER Starter 2023 Building Smarter to Build Greener” Open Innovation Event Participant

badge_template_activities.title: Being a member of the community disrupting the construction industry and actively contributing to shaping the North star for sustainable construction.

Developing innovative ideas and actively participating in the roundtable discussions - “Circularity - next level urban mining of Construction Demolition Waste”, “Closing the loop for sustainable construction”, “Smart and green supply chains”, “Change management in transformation”, “Leveraging startups to drive disruption” and “Plants of tomorrow and decarbonisation”.
Understanding the ways to improve construction industry towards a sustainable future.
Gaining knowledge on trends and challenges of the industry.

ebf8c425-de29-4c42-b9de-ddc619a695cd.description: A Digital Empowerment Program that aims to equip Holcim leaders with the tools to drive digital innovation at Holcim. It is targeted specifically at a select cohort of leaders from various Holcim countries tasked with accelerating the commercial transformation of the RMX business. The focus lies on enhancing the adoption of ConcreteDirect as well as the usage of ConcreteDirect to approach profitability growth in an innovative and digital way.
ebf8c425-de29-4c42-b9de-ddc619a695cd.name: MAQER Garage Completion - Equipping Holcim Leaders for Driving Digital Innovation

badge_template_activities.title: Work user-centred, make use of agile methodologies, understand the power of digital, and scale and connect digital projects to have a sustainable impact on the organization.
Develop deep understanding of ConcreteDirect’s customers design and prototype customer-centric, innovative ideas.

Accelerate adoption of ConcreteDirect , refine ideas using data-driven decision-making successfully lead ConcreteDirect implementation through the organization identify and test use cases with business impact.

8c24be6e-e1a2-4cac-9927-9a85c266bb99.description: A Digital Empowerment Program that aims to equip Holcim leaders with the tools to drive digital innovation at Holcim. It is targeted specifically at a selected group of Leaders who are driving the transformation of Holcim's European lighthouse cement plants and the supply chain area. The focus lies on driving the adoption and usage of existing Plants of Tomorrow technology with the ultimate aim of changing ways of working and enhancing our operating model.
8c24be6e-e1a2-4cac-9927-9a85c266bb99.name: MAQER Garage Cohort 2 Completion - Equipping Holcim Leaders for Driving Digital Innovation

badge_template_activities.title: Work user-centred, make use of agile methodologies, understand the power of digital, and scale and connect digital projects to have a sustainable impact on the organization.

Developing and testing ideas, using design thinking to come up with and test innovation ideas; participants are familiarized with data-driven decision-making techniques to test and refine these ideas.

Leading innovation introduces participants to a unique understanding and practice of leadership that involves not only hierarchical decision-making but savvy orchestration of persuasion, trust, and power – to successfully lead good new ideas through the organisation.

7478e0d5-d59a-4a5e-9717-de1b3b166da4.description: This badge proves that the following hacker emerged with an innovative idea in Holcim MAQER x Converge Challenge at HackZurich 2022 - A Sustainable Future for Inevitable Urban Construction.
7478e0d5-d59a-4a5e-9717-de1b3b166da4.name: HackZurich 2022 MAQER x Converge Hacker

badge_template_activities.title: Converge and Holcim MAQER shared data from platforms designed to improve logistics and communications between jobsites and relevant internal staff; as well as from in-field sensors providing real-time quality insights on freshly poured concrete. The construction sector requires data-driven solutions enabling optimised use of scarce resources, improved certainty of services/products, and lower costs to serve. This was the mission of the hackers which they have achieved with success.
